pop_up_window

Class CustomLocationLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • pop_up_window.CustomLocationLoader

  • public class CustomLocationLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class will pop up a window for entering custom location.
    Author:
    xuping

    • Method Detail

      • loadWindow

        public void loadWindow(TextView newLocation,
              ListViewAdapter listViewAdapter,
              LocationGenerator locationGenerator,
              Context context,
              Activity activity)
        Load and show the window, then set the click listener of the button on the window.
        Parameters:
        newLocation - : a TextView which will display the custom location after input and commit the custom location.
        listViewAdapter - : a ListViewAdapter which is the adapter of the ListView will be sorted.
        locationGenerator - : a LocationGenerator object which will help construct the custom location.
        context - : a Context.
        activity - : The Activity where the function will be called.
